para.text: In some cases, the paths for your models might change either because you have moved or renamed the model directory or because the models are on a removable or network drive. If possible, it is best to keep the ModelArchiver file on the same drive as the models because the paths to the models are stored in the ModelArchiver file relative to the location of the ModelArchiver file itself. However, you can update the paths if you need to do so.
